alfredsnippet.snippet:
"Science is a bit like the ancient Egyptian religion, which never threw old gods away but only tacked them onto newer deities until a bizarre hodgepodge developed. For some strange reason, science is equally reluctant to discard worn-out theories ... even though there was absolutely no evidence to support [them] ..."

- Robert O. Becker, The Body Electric
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Science is Reluctant to Discard Worn-out Theories
